text: The 1951-52 Austrian football championship was organized by the Austrian Football Association. The professionally run Staatsliga B served as the lower tier of the State League A. It only included clubs from Vienna, Lower Austria, Burgenland, Upper Austria and Styria. For clubs from western Austria, the Tauernliga (Salzburg, Carinthia) and the Arlbergliga (Tyrol, Vorarlberg) were organized on an amateur basis. The regional leagues of the federal states served as the third tier. ==Promoted for the 1952-53 season == *VfB Union Mödling (Champion Staatsliga B) *Grazer SC (Runner-up Staatsliga B) *Salzburger AK 1914 (after Play-Off Staatsliga B,Tauernliga, Arlbergliga: ) ==Final table== Table mode (in case of equal points): 1st criterion goal quotient Pl.
